title: 1.12.2有没有同时支持服务器插件（最好是bukkit/spigot）与forge模组的服务端
author: aa0307bb

replies.author: Mikoto。
replies.txt_content:
catserver
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=840599
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=924736

mohist
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=916340

目前主流的高版本支持插件的mod核心

replies.author: 龙息法师
replies.txt_content: 目前就这两个核心最好用，推荐catserver，记得给最佳

replies.author: Charlotte-Arthu
replies.txt_content: 推荐catserver我现在自己用的就是这个核心
